text:
Ordered plain bee hoon goreng which they had cooked and displayed. Chose tahu goreng, bagedil, hotdog, tempeh and chicken wing. Total $10.50.
I asked for price breakdown, the lady said bee hoon $2.50, hotdog $2â€¦ i stopped listening when she said hotdog $2. There was about 7-8 pieces of hotdog only.. $2???!!! Seriously?
I know f&b rental high, overheads all that high. But freaking $2 for 7-8 pieces CUT HOTDOGS? Thatâ€™s like only about 2 pieces of whole hotdogs! I commented $2 very expensive but i paid anyway as i did not want to cause any trouble or hold up the queue.
The food was oily and bee hoon was cold. Chicken wing was not well marinated, only the skin tasted some turmeric and the insides were bland. Not worth $10.50 at all.
Please look into your pricing.. itâ€™s crazily expensive and charge rightfully!
Definately not recommended and this is the last $10.50 youâ€™ll be getting from me.

The best Tahu Goreng that Iâ€™ve tasted. Very flavorful tofu (huge) and itâ€™s the peanut gravy thatâ€™s the star of this dish. Yummy breakast and value for money! Had mee rebus and mee siam @3.50 each. Generous portion and real good. Coming back for Soto n Longtong. Try it and remember to compliment themğŸ˜Š
